channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] Cloud Backup for VPC (is.backup-policy)
item.description: Provides the ability to schedule VPC block storage snapshot backups and manage retention through backup policies.

item.title: [added] Match 360 with Watson (mdm-oc)
item.description: IBM Match 360 with Watson (Match 360) improves trust in AI pipelines by identifying duplicate records and providing reliable data about your customers, suppliers or partners.

item.title: [removed] NeuVector Container Security Platform (neuvector-container-security)
item.description: Full lifecycle Kubernetes container security platform with end-to-end vulnerability & compliance management and run-time protection with an integrated Layer 7 container firewall.

item.title: [removed] Placement Groups for VPC (is.placement-group)
item.description: Spread VSIs across hosts and/or racks for improved disaster avoidance

item.title: [removed] Satellite Infrastructure Service (satellite-iaas)
item.description: Satellite Infrastructure Service offering for IBM Cloud Satellite

item.title: [updated] Data Replication (data-replication) has changed the description of the plan named data-replication-lite-plan
item.description: *before*: The Lite plan for Data Replication offers a trial experience that allows users to preview real time replication from Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL or Db2 on Cloud on the IBM Cloud into Db2 Warehouse on Cloud on the IBM, Amazon and Azure Clouds., *after*: The Lite plan for Data Replication offers a trial experience that allows users to preview real time replication from Amazon RDS for PostgreSQL or Db2 on Cloud on the IBM Cloud into Db2 Warehouse on the IBM, Amazon and Azure Clouds.

item.title: [updated] Hyper Protect DBaaS for MongoDB (hyperp-dbaas-mongodb) has changed the description of the plan named mongodb-free
item.description: *before*: A MongoDB service instance consisting of one primary node and two secondary nodes for high availability within the region. Free plan instance will be deleted after 30 days., *after*: MongoDB consisting of three replicas for high availability within the region. Free plan instance will be deleted after 30 days.

item.title: [updated] Hyper Protect DBaaS for PostgreSQL (hyperp-dbaas-postgresql) has changed the description of the plan named postgresql-free
item.description: *before*: A PostgreSQL service instance consisting of one primary node and two secondary nodes for high availability within the region. Free plan instance will be deleted after 30 days., *after*: PostgreSQL consisting of three replicas for high availability within the region.Free plan instance will be deleted after 30 days.
